item.description:
To commemorate the first anniversary of the Boston Walking Meetup Group we will return to the place we first walked last year!

The walk will be along the Charles River bike path from Waltham to Watertown and back. The trail includes a suspended pedestrian bridge over the river and several decks built over the water.

Meet outside of Skellig's at 10:30. Park in the Embassy parking facility - enter off of Pine Street.

Need a ride? Please ask for one in your rsvp, saying what area you are in.

Afterwards we will have lunch at:
Tom Can Cook
374 Moody St
781-891-6977

http://tomcancookmenu...
item.name: First Anniversary Walk
